title: AI Alignment
intro: We advance America's AI Action Plan, turning veteran grit and expertise into U.S. strength. Our team's platform experience (Palantir, ServiceNow, Palo Alto, Databricks, AWS/Azure) fuels key pillars, creating value for agencies and nation:

cards.title: Accelerating Adoption
cards.body: Integrate frontier AI for DoD/VA—faster workflows, LLMs; expedited value delivery.

cards.title: Safe AI
cards.body: NIST-tested systems against risks—unbiased, secure safeguards for trust and protection.

cards.title: Workforce Development
cards.body: Train rural veterans via DOL/NSF—building skills, jobs, economic growth.

cards.title: Small Business / Security
cards.body: Leverage SBIR/STTR for affordable AI—counter adversaries, enhance controls.

cards.title: American Values
cards.body: Uphold integrity, free speech; reinvest 20% profits in veterans/families for lasting impact.

cards.title: Platform Execution
cards.body: Deliver with proven platforms and delivery discipline—Palantir, ServiceNow, Palo Alto, Databricks, AWS/Azure.
